item.title: XJM-metering-box-distribution-box
item.description:
Product Overview

XJM series metering boxes are suspended or embedded, suitable for the metering of one or more users in civil and commercial residences. The meter box has a multi-door structure, the main switch is installed in the left door, and the watt-hour meter is installed in the right door. , easy to operate.

Performance characteristics：

The outdoor type is suitable for urban, rural, industrial and mining enterprises and other construction sites. It controls AC 50Hz, lighting lines below 500V, and functions as overload, short circuit protection and metering. The structure is completely bent and welded by stainless steel plates. The main structure is composed of box body, box top, box door and inner door. All parts are waterproof and anti-corrosion. There is a cable inlet and outlet hole at the bottom of the box, the size of the hole is standard, and the insulating rubber gasket is set inside, which is easy to knock off, and can also be specially opened according to the special requirements of the user.

The indoor type is suitable for general industrial and mining enterprises and production workshops, and is used for power lighting distribution of 500V and below, 50 Hz AC three-phase system. The structure is made of cold-rolled steel plate bent and welded. The structure of this product is mainly composed of box body, door panel, installation plate and other components. The box body can adopt single door or double door structure.

The main technical parameters:

Main circuit rated voltage: 220V, 380V

Rated insulation voltage: 400V

Rated frequency: 50/60Hz

Rated current: 125A

Protection class: IP30

We welcome global agents, distributors, retailers, and other partners to join us and work together to develop mutually beneficial business relationships. Our products have already been well received by customers in many countries and regions, and we look forward to expanding our reach even further.

contact us: sales@senkuogroup.com
